848130.name: Paws 'n Claws Demo
848130.description:
Paws 'n Claws VR is a hilarious and engaging tower defense game in which you protect your home from an army of invading cats! It offers deep strategic gameplay for experienced players as well as the playful aesthetics and simple controls that make it great for kids.

The demo contains a tutorial level and one mini-level.

What Makes Our Game Unique

1. GDC 2018 and VRLA 2018 Selection

2. Wacky Weapons: Fruit-shooting Cannons, Musical Instruments, Giant Mechs, and More!

3. Fierce Enemies: Bouncing Felines, Disappearing Ninjas, Balloon Floaters, and More!
848130.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
